title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Multimedia Learning Environment Design Based on Cognitive Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic language learning and use of digital environments
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex linguistic concepts by integrating multimedia elements (text, animation, audio)
Learners can optimize the arrangement and delivery of visual/auditory materials by applying cognitive load theory
Learners can design and evaluate language learning content according to the principles of multiple representations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
